title: The Standard Library Documentation Checklist

labels.name: E-easy
labels.description: Call for participation: Experience needed to fix: Easy / not much (good first issue)

labels.name: metabug
labels.description: Issues about issues themselves ("bugs about bugs")

labels.name: E-help-wanted
labels.description: Call for participation: Help is requested to fix this issue.

labels.name: A-docs
labels.description: Area: documentation for any part of the project, including the compiler, standard library, and tools

labels.name: C-tracking-issue
labels.description: Category: A tracking issue for an RFC or an unstable feature.

body:
I've been doing work on random parts of the standard library, but it's time to get systematic.

Here's a list of all of the top-level modules in `std`, with separate tracking issues for each part. Documentation is never done, but I'd at least like to ensure that every module is seen at least once.

PRs will be sent for consistency, more examples, better explanations, all the usual stuff. But here's how we can track progress.

One specific area where we can do much better is linking of types to their docs in text explanations.
- [x] home page https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/29330
- [x] array https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/29331
- [x] bool https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/29332
- [x] char https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/29333
- [x] floats https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/29334
- [x] integers https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/29335
- [x] raw pointers https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/29336
- [x] slices https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/29337
- [x] str https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/29338
- [x] tuples https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/29339
- [x] any https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/29340
- [x] borrow https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/29342
- [x] boxed https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/29343
- [x] cell https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/29344
- [x] char https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/29345
- [x] clone https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/29346
- [x] cmp https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/29347
- [x] collections https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/29348
- [x] convert https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/29349

- [x] std::integer https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/29358
- [x] io https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/29359

- [x] ops https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/29365
- [x] option https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/29366
- [ ] os https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/29367
- [x] prelude https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/29369
- [ ] process https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/29370
- [x] ptr https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/29371
- [x] rc https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/29372
- [x] result https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/29373
- [x] std::slice https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/29374
- [x] std::str https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/29375
- [x] string https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/29376
